alert.note: Alert for Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains; Helena Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 3:42PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Lewis and Clark and northeastern Jefferson Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 342 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Montana City, or 13 miles northeast of Boulder, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Heavy rain, winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... East Helena, Montana City, Clancy, Jefferson City, Alhambra and Corbin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
